thread.title: Hawaii’s spectacular ‘fire hose’ lava flow flares up once again
thread.title_full: Hawaii’s spectacular ‘fire hose’ lava flow flares up once again

title: Hawaii’s spectacular ‘fire hose’ lava flow flares up once again
text: Hawaii’s Kilauea Volcano has once again released a dramatic “fire hose” lava flow into the Pacific Ocean. The lava flow had continued for weeks during January but seemed to have disappeared, until Wednesday. Once the molten lava comes into contact with the ocean, an explosive reaction occurs that can send debris flying. New land is...
